I am looking for 5 - 10 researchers to voluntarily participate in an
effor=
t that will become a part of the mini-documentary I am planning to
begin fi=
lming later this month.  When completed early in 2009 I will be
placing thi=
s video on my Youtube site for all to view. Freely sharing
our research is =
the key!  If you are one that participates, I'd like to
be able to mention =
you and display your work in the video.

The subject of the research is:
At=
tempted spirit contact using an object associated with a disaster as a
cata=
lysis for a specific contact... away from the scene of the disaster.

If se=
lected, the volunteer researcher will be mailed a small amount of
material =
associated with the aircraft crash in question.  This crash
debris was obta=
ined after all litigation was complete and a salvage
company had purchased =
all debris from the airline company.
Note: There are no health hazards asso=
ciated with the debris.
Note: The detailed information about the crash is n=
ot being giving at
this time in order to make it a controlled ITC experimen=
t.  This way the
audio files I receive from participants may or may not con=
tain
information about those who perished or information about their life. =
 I
alone know that information at this time.

It won't take much of your ti=
me.  All I ask from the selected
researchers are five, 30 second audio file=
s of attempted spirit contact,
using a method of the researcher's choice.  =
The crash debris you will be
provided must be used in association with the =
attempted contacts. (Close
proximity to the recording device is encouraged.=
)
You can e-mail me the audio files, along with a text explanation of how
t=
he files were captured when you complete you research. (Method used,
how de=
bris was used, etc.)

If you are interested in volunteering, please send me=

through this forum and tell me a bit about yourself and w=
hat method you
currently use.  If you are one of those selected I will repl=
y to your

hich

,

Thanks!
- Mike C. (UFO Geek) www.ufogeek.com <=

atter of seconds prior to their terrifying

ibed the aftermath scene as more

S=
ome say spirit communication is more likely to occur if a person had

ed a quick, tragic death, with minimal time to prepare but enough

ragic accident.

al report

the

umber of paranormal devices will be used, some

d Earth" in late

ite

<P>I am looking for 5 - 10 researchers to voluntarily participate in an eff=
ort that will become a part of the mini-documentary I am planning to begin =
filming later this month.  When completed early in 2009 I will be plac=
ing this video on my Youtube site for all to view. Freely sharing our resea=
rch is the key!  If you are one that participates, I'd like to be able=
 to mention you and display your work in the video.</P>
<P><STRONG>The subj=
ect of the research is:</STRONG><BR>Attempted spirit contact using an objec=
t associated with a disaster as a catalysis for a specific contact... away =
from the scene of the disaster.</P>
<P>If selected, the volunteer researche=
r will be mailed a small amount of material associated with the aircraft cr=
ash in question.  This crash debris was obtained after all litigation =
was complete and a salvage company had purchased all debris from the airlin=
e company.<BR>Note: There are no health hazards associated with the debris.=
<BR>Note: The detailed information about the crash is not being giving at t=
his time in order to make it a controlled ITC experiment.  This way th=
e audio files I receive from participants may or may not contain informatio=
n about those who perished or information about their life.  I alone k=
now that information at this time.</P>
<P>It won't take much of your time.&=
nbsp; All I ask from the selected researchers are five, 30 second audio fil=
es of attempted spirit contact, using a method of the researcher's choice.&=
nbsp; The crash debris you will be provided must be used in association wit=
h the attempted contacts. (Close proximity to the recording device is encou=
raged.)<BR>You can e-mail me the audio files, along with a text explanation=
 of how the files were captured when you complete you research. (Method use=
d, how debris was used, etc.)</P>
<P>If you are interested in volunteering,=
 please send me a private e-mail through this forum and tell me a bit about=
 yourself and what method you currently use.  If you are one of those =
selected I will reply to your e-mail, asking for a mailing address to send =
the object debris (which will arrive in a small padded envelope.)  I d=
on't need the debris back, so keep it if you wish...</P>
<P>Thanks!<BR>- Mi=
ke C. (UFO Geek) <A href=3D"http://www.ufogeek.com">www.ufogeek.com</A></P>=
